customColumn3.label: COPY
customColumn3.onClick:
{{copyToClipboard('Retailer Code - ' + whatsapp_report_table.triggeredRow.retailer_code + '\n'+
'Retailer Name - '+whatsapp_report_table.triggeredRow.retailer_name+'\n'+
'Contact - '
+whatsapp_report_table.triggeredRow.retailer_contacts+'\n'+
'ASM Name - '
+whatsapp_report_table.triggeredRow.asm_name+ '\n'+
'ASM Contact - '		+whatsapp_report_table.triggeredRow.asm_contact + '\n'+
'Sales Name - ' +
whatsapp_report_table.triggeredRow.sales_name+ '\n'+
'Sales Contact - '+
whatsapp_report_table.triggeredRow.sales_contact+ '\n' +
'Status - ' + whatsapp_report_table.triggeredRow.group_request_status+'\n'+
'Remarks - '+whatsapp_report_table.triggeredRow.remarks
);showAlert("Details Copied Successfully","success")}}
